pacman_piccolo

Interface Board


  • public interface Board
    This is a class that controls the board layout and game logic.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean gameOver()
      returns true if the number of lives is 0, false otherwise
      int numberLives()
      returns current number of lives pacman has left
      void resetRound()
      Moves all the mobs to their beginning positions and refills gameComponents into the board.
      boolean roundOver()
      returns true if game is over or pacman was eaten by ghost, false otherwise
      int score()
      returns the current score of this game of pacman
      void updatePosition(int direction)
      updates board with new position of mobs based on given direction and gameComponents to what they should be

    • Method Detail

      • score

        int score()
        returns the current score of this game of pacman
        Returns:
        current score

      • numberLives

        int numberLives()
        returns current number of lives pacman has left
        Returns:
        pacman's remaining lives

      • updatePosition

        void updatePosition(int direction)
        updates board with new position of mobs based on given direction and gameComponents to what they should be
        Parameters:
        direction - sets pacman's position for that turn
        Preconditions
        game is not over and
        Postconditions
        score is updated, if pacman died appropriate end game has started. If no issues, then every mob would have moved one space and any edible game components would be eaten.

      • gameOver

        boolean gameOver()
        returns true if the number of lives is 0, false otherwise
        Returns:
        whether or not the game is over

      • roundOver

        boolean roundOver()
        returns true if game is over or pacman was eaten by ghost, false otherwise
        Returns:
        whether or not round is over

      • resetRound

        void resetRound()
        Moves all the mobs to their beginning positions and refills gameComponents into the board.
        Preconditions
        roundOver && !gameOver
